column4: Can anyone tell me what could be going on, when I ping google.com its a unkown host but when I ping the ip I got a 96% packet loss after sending 57 packets
I also can't access local ips or ping my router
Sam fisher can't go on any website and I don't think it'd the dns
Well if you get unknown host then you need to fix your DNS.  I don't know why you're losing so many packets.
